# constant(_:)

**Type Method**

Enforces that the string be precisely the given value.

## Declaration

```swift
static func constant(_ value: String) -> GenerationGuide<String>
```

## Getting the constant

- **anyOf(_:)**: Enforces that the string be one of the provided values.

items.description: Enforces that the string be one of the provided values.
items.name: anyOf(_:)
